actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969, to permit the President to use export controls to curtail serious inflation in domestic prices.

summary.text: Permits the President, under the Export Administration Act, to use export controls to curtail inflation in domestic prices. (Amends 50 U.S.C. App. 2402(2)(A))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969, to permit the President to use export controls to curtail serious inflation in domestic prices.
